content: In the spirit of @Josh Mandel and @Gino Canessa , a nice educational video by @Nick Hatt on Resource References: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Uo_mSSU-NtE

Great stuff @Nick Hatt! Quick pedantic note on terms : there's a distinction between an absolute URL and a canonical URL; all canonical URLs are absolute, but not all absolute URLs are canonical URLs. So to be precise, it's better to talk about populating Refernece.url with a "relative or absolute URL" rather than a "relative or canonical URL".
